text: Recently, because of the material issues, some researchers have been attempted to use plastic materials as an alternative solution. Among the various types of polymers, cyclic olefin copolymer (COC) is one of the most popular polymeric materials in the fabrication of microfluidic chips. COC is a well-known polymeric material with various advantages, including high clarity and light transmission, excellent mechanical properties and great biocompatibility [8] .
